1. New blood test could diagnose prostate cancer more accurately  The Telegraph
  2. Breakthrough blood test could detect cancer killing more than 12,000 each year  The Mirror
  3. Scientists hail 'promising results' from breakthrough prostate cancer blood test  GB News
  4. UK scientists to create 'game-changer' blood test for common cancer  Surrey Live
